text: Nɨ dughiar otevimra kagh ike, kamaghɨn, kɨ nɨ damutɨ nɨ nguibar kam ategh pura e ko daruan kogham. E pura tintinibar ikɨ daruam. Kamaghɨn, nɨ uan mɨdorozir gumaziba inigh uamategh mangɨtɨ deragham. Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn apangkuvim ko an arazir a ia baghavɨra itim, guizbangɨra ia ko zurara ikɨ.”15:20 Hibrun akam deragha vezɨn kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. Bar fomɨra gumazir maba akar kam Grighɨn akamɨn a giragha an osiri, ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn Aruamɨn akam Grighɨn akamɨn gɨn zui.
